alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued August 14 at 7:21PM MST until August 14 at 8:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... East central La Paz County in west central Arizona... * Until 815 PM MST. * At 721 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Brenda to 12 miles southeast of Kofa Wildlife Refuge, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 36 and 66. US Highway 60 between mile markers 36 and 70. AZ Route 72 between mile markers 38 and 49. Locations impacted include... Salome, Vicksburg, Vicksburg Junction, Wenden and Harcuvar. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
